channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Figma’s IPO seeks a $13 billion valuation, with a bitcoin investment as a sweetener
item.description: Figma sets terms in its upcoming initial public offering, and co-founder Dylan Field could net more than $60 million from selling his personal shares.

item.title: ‘Poof! His money could disappear’: My boyfriend is 75. His portfolio is down 4% this year. Do we fire his adviser?
item.description: “His portfolio is still down from the April slump when everybody else’s accounts have gone up.”

item.title: Here’s what Americans are willing to sacrifice to save Social Security
item.description: Americans agree — across political, economic and generational lines — that the program is worth saving.

item.title: You will be auto-enrolled in Medicare Advantage and locked in for three years under this new bill in Congress
item.description: Medicare Advantage could become the default insurance program for all older adults

item.title: Verizon’s stock is having its best day in over a year. Here’s the big highlight from earnings.
item.description: The telecom giant upped its expectations for free cash flow, a closely followed investor metric.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...
